ygData.subject: Remember to vote!
ygData.msgSnippet: Remember, you can vote on bugs and enhancement-requests in the Heritrix JIRA issues tracker:

Remember, you can vote on bugs and enhancement-requests in the Heritrix 
JIRA issues tracker:

http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER?report=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.project:popularissues-panel

We will likely make a 1.14.3 patch release soon, so any 
low-risk/easy-fix changes that have so far escaped prioritization could 
be considered for inclusion.

- Gordon @ IA
